scenes.name: Introduction
scenes.description: Animated title card with the Knowledge Transfer Framework logo. Nodes and connections fade in, representing the interconnected nature of knowledge systems. Camera slowly zooms into the network.

scenes.name: Elastic Time
scenes.description: Visual representation of time dilation and compression in learning contexts. Clock elements stretch and compress, showing how knowledge transfer operates across different temporal scales.

scenes.name: Entanglement
scenes.description: Network of knowledge nodes that light up and form connections. When one node activates, related nodes illuminate, demonstrating the entangled nature of knowledge relationships.

scenes.name: Dark Matter
scenes.description: Visualization of implicit knowledge as dark matter. Visible knowledge elements surrounded by invisible but influential forces, gradually revealing hidden connections and tacit understanding.

scenes.name: Consciousness
scenes.description: Abstract representation of knowledge integration into conscious awareness. Flowing particles coalesce into structured forms, symbolizing the transformation of information into understanding.

scenes.name: Learning Levels
scenes.description: Layered pyramid or staircase animation showing progressive levels of learning. Each level builds upon the previous, with knowledge elements flowing upward through the structure.

scenes.name: Applications
scenes.description: Split-screen montage of real-world applications. Icons and graphics representing education, research, industry, and innovation, connected by flowing knowledge transfer pathways.

scenes.name: Closing
scenes.description: Return to the full network view from scene 1, now fully illuminated and active. Call-to-action text and repository information fade in. Smooth zoom out to reveal the complete framework ecosystem.
